citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
05-Sep-19.
No persons were available to conduct the inspection. Knocked on door, honked horn, left facility to gain cell signal
and placed a call to provided number with no answer. Returned later to find still no persons available.
